General.Name: Roscan Gold Corporation
General.Description: Roscan Gold Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold properties in West Africa. It holds 100% interests in the Kandiole project comprising ten contiguous gold exploration permits covering an area of approximately 401.8 square kilometers located in Mali, West Africa. The company was formerly known as Roscan Minerals Corporation and changed its name to Roscan Gold Corporation in September 2018. Roscan Gold Corporation was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Sun Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, B4A 1E6
